patterns: i need to update my ID
how to get new ID after loosing
responses:
There is a little Bit process to get new ID Card After loosing it
1. Wait a littele bit while some one call to you before deciding
2. Goto registrar office and tell them that you lost your ID After that they give
 you a letter to Police Station and take a photo for your new ID
3. take the latter and goto the Police Station tell them that you lost your ID
 and where you came from after some Question the give you a Paper
4.Back to your School and make payment in Finance Office Price may vary year to year Recent Price is 150ETB
5. Finally take your reset and goto registrar and they give you New ID

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses:
You need to take national entrance exam also you have to get the result at least for Degree the result can vary year to year
in case of u have Diploma u need to pass COC up to level 3
If you come's form other univerisy you need transcript ID and 2.5 or greater GPA

responses: There may be no class in a day or you may have atmost 8 class in a day but in the week it dependes on the each course credit hour

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses: Our COllege have diffrent teaching methods we have teachin labs specially for Computer Scientiests also we give you practical class whatever you have taken course in addition for we have projector in all labs if your class is not in lab your instructor can take portable Projector

There are assignments which carry more weight than your written exams. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.
we have 2 types of Exams in general of school which are Mid Exam and Final Examp they are scheduled by School but may be your instructor can give you some quizes in a class to suppurt your grade

we open at 12:00 Mornign LocalTime but all courses are start at 2:30 and we Close 4:00 PM LocalTime the time can separate in 2 ways
1. For Reqular which can be form 2:300 upto 11:20
2. For Extension 12:00 pm to 4:00pm

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Holiday(Culture) festival. 
 Also our college has a mini park to get fresh air, table tennis, Cafee to take some Cofee.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, classes with Computer labs, discusson room, parking space, and student service for any students queries.

patterns: What is the goal of the institution?
What is the purpose of the school?
responses:
Mission
The Mission of St. Mary’s University is to offer conventional and distance education that is accessible to the larger society through reasonable tuition focusing on quality and standards in teaching, research and outreach services.

Vision
The Vision of St. Mary’s University is to become among the leading higher education centers of academic excellence in teaching-learning, research, publications and community services in East-Africa and contribute to the development of Ethiopia.,
